answer: AI, VR, and AR related experience is available in the portfolio context. You can ask for AI workflows, VR projects, or Unity-based work.
UI/UX and HMI related experience is covered in the portfolio. You can ask about dashboards, interface systems, and product UI projects.
Game UI focused work is available. You can ask for HUD, in-game interface patterns, and interaction design examples.
Visual design and creative direction related work is included. You can ask about branding, layout systems, or cross-platform design outputs.
